creator: NuVizz Inc.
descriptionHtml:
DeliverIt by nuVizz is an affordable and easy-to-use mobile dispatch, & ePOD app built on the latest in Mobile technologies.

The flexible app provides capabilities in field services, contractors, trucking, shipping, courier services and others.

DeliverIt allows you to dispatch assignments (work orders/ routes/ loads/ tasks) to both your company and 3rd party drivers, view and dispatch to vehicles in real-time on a personalized geo-map, and have access to signed ePOD's instantly. Signed POD can be a signed PDF document captured on the device or a signature image on the device.

The solution also includes a free Mobile Device Management (MDM) system to manage and secure your company's mobile devices.

Key Features of DeliverIt
* Real-time Visibility
* Dispatch Management & Execution
* Electronic Document Management / ePOD
* Bar-code Scanning / Camera
* Breadcrumb Tracing
* Geo Fencing
* 3rd Party Driver Tracking
* Time Stamping / Reporting
* Free Mobile Device Management and Custom App Store.

DeliverIt runs on iPhones, iPad and iPad mini, that are used by drivers/ technicians and resides on their devices as an app.

Note: With DeliverIt App, you can access DeliverIt mobile features. Please contact your system administrator for access credentials. To get a demo account, you can request for it in the support page.

descriptionShort: Field Service dispatch and management at your finger tips

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1. Improved scanning ability.
2. Added support for Auto application upgrade(In-App update).
3. Added in-progress indication for shipment cards
4. Expanded support for Android 12+ OS Version.
5. Ability to provide delay reason during stop delivery.
6. Optimised image capture ability.
7. Improvements and bug fixes.

The solution also includes a free Mobile Device Management (MDM) system to manage and secure your company's mobile devices.

Key Features of DeliverIt
* Real-time Visibility
* Dispatch Management & Execution
* Electronic Document Management / ePOD
* Bar-code Scanning / Camera
* Breadcrumb Tracing
* Geo Fencing
* 3rd Party Driver Tracking
* Time Stamping / Reporting
* Free Mobile Device Management and Custom App Store.

DeliverIt runs on iPhones, iPad and iPad mini, that are used by drivers/ technicians and resides on their devices as an app.

Note: With DeliverIt App, you can access DeliverIt mobile features. Please contact your system administrator for access credentials. To get a demo account, you can request for it in the support page.
descriptionShort: Field Service dispatch and management at your finger tips

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Supported portal migration from older version to new version
- Improvements and bug fixes.

- Bug fixes and Improvements.
